testcase.name: Successful login with valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launched Edge browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then Page title should be "Dashboard/nopCommerce administration"............passed When User click on log out link.............................................passed Then Page title should be "Your Strore.Login"...............................passed And Closing browser........................................................passed
